page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT IN PARR.
page.content: We organized a survey around a local area, called Fingerpost to enquire about local entertainment. A poll of thirty people were asked each of these five questions:- 1."What do you do for entertainment in the evenings?". Sixteen watched television, fourteen took part in 'Pub Sports'. 2."Do you visit the St.Helens Show?" (An annual 3 day event in July) Fifteen did fifteen did not. 3."Is there enough entertainment for adults in the area?" Eleven said yes, eighteen said no, one did not know. 4." Do you ever go to watch St.Helens RLFC?". Twenty four said no, only six attended. 5."Do you think there is enough entertainment for children?". One said yes and twenty nine said no.
